entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing drizzle near noon. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending overnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Sunday 12 February 2023
